pages.text: MIMI also includes a common configuration file with several additional settings that apply to the client in singleplayer and server in multiplayer.$(br2)Like other mods, the configuration file for MIMI can be found in your Minecraft instance $(#0046ff)config$() folder and can be modified with any text editor or IDE.

pages.title: Instrumentalist Shop
pages.text: $(l)Param:$() enableInstrumentalistShop$(br)$(l)Type:$() Boolean$(br)$(l)Default:$() true$(br2)This parameter stores whether or not Instrumentalist Shops should generate in villages.

pages.title: Instrument Mobs
pages.text: $(l)Param:$() allowedInstrumentMobs$(br)$(l)Type:$() Comma-Separated List$(br)$(l)Default:$() minecraft:zombie,minecraft:husk,minecraft:skeleton,minecraft:stray,minecraft:wither_skeleton$(br2)This parameter stores a comma separated list of mobs that should be able to hold instruments.
